Parameterization-specific


```{r}
X <- seq(0,1, length=1000)
obs <- data.frame(x = X,
                  y = sin(2*pi*10*X)+.3*rnorm(length(X)))
```


  
### Direct method 

``` {r}
d <- gp_fit(obs, X, c(sigma_n=1, l=.0001, tau=.3), "direct")
plot.gpfit(d)
```


``` {r}
d <- gp_fit(obs, X, c(sigma_n=1, l=10, tau=.3), "direct")
plot.gpfit(d)
```
